title: UI & Prototype Specs
content: Hundreds (maybe over a thousand?) of diagrams, mockups, and wireframes have been produced to guide developers in coding the interactive elements needed for users to progress through various tasks and funnels.

title: Optimization Experiments
content: Are the graphics working? Is the copy being understood? How likely is the user able to understand and complete what they want to complete on your website/app? These questions get answered through user testing. See Optimization Ideation sessions where developers, designers, steakeholders all get together to generate ideas to guide A/B/C testing.

title: Design & Branding
content: Has AI conquered image generation? Yes, yes it has... designers can harness this to make those great AI visuals relevant, specific and standard to a particular business's visual branding and commuincation goals.
